attributes.additional_details:
To call upon Her Majesty's government to reject proposals for further collaboration of British military capabilities with the European Union.

1)  Her Majesty's government should immediately reject the transferring over of the RAF Voyager refuelling Aircraft and other military assets to other member states.

2) Any further integration into the European Union should be halted until 2017. Dependant upon;
A) Whether the European Referendum Bill is passed into law.


3) Her Majesty's government must ensure that before any decision is finalised, there must be a debate and vote in the House of Commons and in 'government time.'
